name: Bobbithy's Adventure
description:
This is a short game about the adventures of Bobbithy. 

This game includes: 

-Bullet-hell action that'll make you rage

-A loveable character you're sure to hold dear

-A creation made with as much love as you'll have for the smol guy

-Some bopping beats (Made by Haunted Target)

-A Linux Version (YAY!!!)

Enjoy the game!!! -HT

1 Out Of 1000000000000000000000000... Don't Recommend -Sophia from A Story

I can't seem to tell what is what with the lower graphics but, it's a good game! -The guy from Platnium

Stp Cntrllng M!!! -Bobbithy from A Story and Bobbithy's Adventure
